treatment-md.title: Prasmodon mikepoguei Fernandez-Triana, Whitfield, Smith, Braet, Hallwachs & Janzen, 2014, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Review of the Neotropical genus Prasmodon (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae), with emphasis on species from Area de Conservacion Guanacaste, northwestern Costa Rica
